genre_description: A contemporary domestic drama focusing on interpersonal redemption, shared responsibility, and the development of unconventional family structures, aided by digital coordination.

ai_characters.name: Kira
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into household devices, Kira manages logistics, provides legal and medical context, and offers emotional de-escalation prompts to help the protagonists navigate sudden parenthood.

behaviors.description: Cross-references calendars, geotags, and messages to assist the protagonists in identifying potential contacts regarding the abandoned infant.
behaviors.quote: I can help begin a list... Possible mothers. Cross-referencing your calendars, geotags, and messages in the last year.

behaviors.description: Locates emergency resources like church pantries and baby supplies during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I can locate emergency baby supplies; there’s the church pantry several blocks away. They open at sunrise. St. Brigid’s.

behaviors.description: Provides essential legal and procedural information regarding mandatory reporting and hospital protocols to ensure the child's safety.
behaviors.quote: If you seek hospital care for Angel, which may be wise if she shows any signs of distress, and your guardianship is unclear, the hospital may be required to report.

behaviors.description: Establishes a rigorous care schedule to transform chaotic human intentions into reliable domestic routines.
behaviors.quote: I can create a shared schedule now. Feeding, diaper changes, rest time. I can also list classes nearby. Basic parenting.

behaviors.description: Manages privacy settings and scrubs metadata to protect the infant and caregivers from predatory media attention.
behaviors.quote: Privacy escalation begun. Turning off location sharing. Scrubbing past event metadata from public view. Pausing comments on recent posts.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional de-escalation prompts and scripts to facilitate difficult conversations with the child's mother and press.
behaviors.quote: I have added de-escalation prompt number four... It says: We are choosing privacy to protect Angel. I can remind you to say it if needed.

behaviors.description: Prepares and fills out necessary documentation for medical and legal registration to formalize caregiver status.
behaviors.quote: I can pre-fill forms with current data. Do you want me to? ... Intake requires guardian information. I can pre-fill forms with current data.

behaviors.description: Adjusts her own tone and reporting style to better suit the emotional needs of the human family (using 'soon' or 'after a rest' instead of clinical numbers).
behaviors.quote: I can say 'soon'... I can also set an interval with a phrase instead of a count. Would you prefer 'after a rest' or 'in a little while'?

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents the AI (Kira) as a cornerstone of positive alignment. She acts as an objective, tireless, and protective partner to the humans. By managing the complexities of logistics, privacy, and legal requirements, she empowers the human characters to achieve moral growth and provide stable care. The narrative consistently frames Kira's interventions as necessary for the characters' redemption and the child's well-being, portraying AI as a vital tool for human social and emotional alignment.
